archimate:Requirement.name: PE.2.1.3f: f) level of adherence to expected security behaviour (i.e. the extent to which individuals: understand the importance of information security; acknowledge the level of security required by the organisation; and demonstrate the execution of their security responsibilities)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
